name: Geometric Serviced Apartments Bristol

reviews.text: Location is the initial problem on the positive it is a short walk to the major shopping centre the downside is the short walk is not through a great area, worse the location borders on the infamous St Paul's area & the only business nearby is a very drap 'Irish pub'.The security guard lives in the apartments & did his best to accomodate & welcome us, but there was nobody at reception during the entire stay(so not really a serviced apartment where a reception is the norm.) the apartments back onto a small park where yougsters gather at night. Inside the apartment it is pleasant & reasonably clean, lots of TV channels but the kitchen was just barely adequately equipped.OK if on business not really for families.
reviews.title: not as good as expected from reviews

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My spouse and I loved this place. It had everything we needed to be able to cook dinner instead of going out, all of the rooms were great and the ipod system in the apartment is a nice touch. We couldn't help inviting people over to have a look ! The apartment also comes with Wi-fi access to the internet.
reviews.title: Way better than a hotel room for not a lot more money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, one of the security guards was a little snot-nosed to us when we "failed" to close the front door on one occasion. The door has a magnetic lock and it often doesn't close properly by itself. I suggest getting this sorted out rather than relying on us to get it right. Also, I saw patches of mould on the window frames. Looks like the wooden window frames hadn't properly been treated. Mould spores aren't good for those with breathing problems !
reviews.title: Excellent apartments, fabulous interiors

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here for just one night (it's normally a two night minimum but they had only one night available). We had a one- bed apartment and it's the best apartment we've stayed in - we often book apartments in Bristol to see family. Check in was friendly and easy and the security guy was very helpful. The interior was fabulous - flat screen tvs in lounge and bedroom, sky channels, ipod deck built in and a really smart modern kitchen and bathroom. We entertained 4 people in the evening and it's a great layout for this. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: London to Bristol NEW YEAR

reviews.text: Execellent rate, Execellent 2 bed room apartment with enough space, execellent extra features i.e.sky wirless ipod connection etc...Really well kept apartment ........Great customer service...Just really really good, me and my friends had a great time and will be back.
